name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_RAW_EVENT_24
summary: Verify in system-wide all CPU PEM perf to check any performance event excursion occurs due to base_freq drop for the raw event ID \"24\" during 60 seconds CPU stress, event ID 24 stands for THERMAL, perf command: perf stat -e pnp_excursion_monitor/event=24,frequency_threshold=$base_freq_mhz,duration=10/ sleep 60
